synopsis.text: Yusaku Kudo's son, Conan, is among the privileged few invited to test a groundbreaking virtual reality game, Noah's Ark. But the festive atmosphere is shattered when a company employee is found murdered, leaving behind a cryptic message hinting at a clue hidden within the game. With the lives of 49 other children at stake, Conan must navigate the virtual 19th century London, team up with the legendary Sherlock Holmes, and unmask the murderer who has taken control of the game. As the line between reality and fantasy blurs, Conan and his friends must solve the mystery and bring the culprit to justice before it's too late. With the fate of 50 innocent children hanging in the balance, Conan must outsmart the notorious Jack the Ripper and escape from the deadly virtual world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
